001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.modal;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebElement;
004import org.openqa.selenium.By;
005
006/**
007 * Represents a modal or dialog window in a UI automation context. Provides methods for
008 * checking whether the modal is open, interacting with contained buttons, retrieving
009 * textual content, and closing the modal.
010 *
011 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
012 */
013public interface Modal {
014
015   /**
016    * Checks if the modal is currently open.
017    *
018    * @return {@code true} if the modal is visible/active, otherwise {@code false}.
019    */
020   boolean isOpened();
021
022   /**
023    * Clicks a button with the specified text inside a given container.
024    *
025    * @param container  the container element within which the button is located.
026    * @param buttonText the visible text of the button to be clicked.
027    */
028   void clickButton(SmartWebElement container, String buttonText);
029
030   /**
031    * Clicks a button identified by its visible text, without specifying a container.
032    *
033    * @param buttonText the visible text of the button to be clicked.
034    */
035   void clickButton(String buttonText);
036
037   /**
038    * Clicks a button identified by a locator.
039    *
040    * @param buttonLocator the locator referencing the button.
041    */
042   void clickButton(By buttonLocator);
043
044   /**
045    * Retrieves the main title text of the modal.
046    *
047    * @return the modal's title text, or an empty string if not present.
048    */
049   String getTitle();
050
051   /**
052    * Retrieves the body text of the modal.
053    *
054    * @return the main textual content of the modal, or an empty string if not present.
055    */
056   String getBodyText();
057
058   /**
059    * Retrieves the content title, which may be separate from the main title, depending on the modal structure.
060    *
061    * @return the content's title, or an empty string if not present.
062    */
063   String getContentTitle();
064
065   /**
066    * Closes or dismisses the modal.
067    *
068    * <p>Typically performs an action such as clicking a close button or ESC key simulation,
069    * depending on the specific modal implementation.
070    */
071   void close();
072
073}
